events.message: Candidate John Smith submitted his application for the Software Engineer position, showcasing extensive experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The application was reviewed and categorized under Engineering due to the candidate's background in software development and devops expertise.
Recruiter Maria Gonzalez was assigned to manage John Smith's recruitment process for the software engineer role.
Initial screening completed with John Smith to verify his technical skills and discuss his previous experience with software engineering projects and devops practices.
John responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the role and confirming availability for a technical interview next week.
Technical interview was scheduled for John Smith on June 10th with the lead engineering team to evaluate his coding and system design skills.
